# Birthday Surprise Landing Page

This is a mobile-first responsive birthday surprise page with creative animations and photo gallery.

## Project Structure
- index.html - Main landing page with birthday wishes and gallery
- styles.css - Mobile-first responsive styling with animations
- script.js - Interactive features and confetti effects
- photos/ - Directory for gallery images
- config.js - Easy customization settings

## Development Notes
- Mobile-first design optimized for Android devices
- Smooth scroll animations and confetti effects
- Responsive photo gallery with lightbox
- Easy to customize colors, text, and images
